Headline: #44 Wallace-Racine Temporary Reroute at Racine/84th
ShortDescription: #44 Wallace-Racine buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Racine, 79th, Loomis, 87th, and Racine, due to street blockage near Racine/84th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#44 Wallace-Racine buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Racine, 79th, Loomis, 87th, and Racine then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near Racine/84th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Delays Affecting O'Hare-bound Blue Line Trains
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running with delays and congestion after an  earlier animal on the tracks at O'Hare. Crews working to restore normal service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running with delays and congestion after an  earlier animal on the tracks at O'Hare.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Crews are working to clear the congestion that's formed/correct the problem and restore normal travel times through the area.

Allow extra travel time.
